text: Skazhi: «YA ne vlasten prinesti sebe pol'zu ili prichinit' sebe vred, yesli togo ne pozhelayet Allakh. Yesli by ya znal sokrovennoye, to priumnozhil by dlya sebya dobro, i zlo ne kosnulos' by menya. Odnako ya - vsego lish' predosteregayushchiy uveshchevatel' i dobryy vestnik dlya veruyushchikh lyudey»
